title: Highland Dawn
description: An immortal with unanswered questions...The immortal Dartayous, a powerful Druid Warrior, is given one mission—keep Moira alive to fulfill the prophecy. But with each passing day the burning desire he feels for her eats away at the wall surrounding his heart…A Druid priestess in search of a key...Moira Sinclair must find the key to enter the Realm of the Fae, but once she enters the sacred realm, secrets she has kept buried rise and force her to see herself for what she really is. Will the beautiful and commanding king of the Fae win her heart? Or will Dartayous finally claim her as his own?
author: Donna Grant
